title: Convert WORD to Range
description: This function takes a WORD input and maps it to a specified range defined by the low and high REAL values. The output is a REAL number that scales the input based on the given range.
name: WORD_TO_RANGE

input.name: X
input.description: The WORD value to be converted into the specified range.

input.name: low
input.description: The lower bound of the range to which the WORD value will be mapped.

input.name: high
input.description: The upper bound of the range to which the WORD value will be mapped.

output.name: WORD_TO_RANGE
output.description: The resulting REAL value after mapping the WORD input into the specified range.

return_value.description: The mapped REAL value based on the input WORD and specified range.
